casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Bobby Daryl McGIRT. No. 390P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2006. Michael Reece, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of July 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review Under G.S. 7A-31":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of August 2006."
